thought: To craft spruce_stairs, I first need to craft spruce_planks. To craft spruce_planks, I need to place 1 spruce_log in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the spruce_log from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
